channel.title: Pranav Rathod
channel.description: Astro.js and Tailwind CSS theme for blog and portfolio by justgoodui.com

item.title: From Denver to Tokyo - My First SIGGRAPH Experience
item.description: In 2024, I attended my first SIGGRAPH conferences—North America in Denver and Asia in Tokyo—as a Student Volunteer. What started as a recommendation from a professor turned into one of the most memorable experiences of my life.

item.title: Closing a Chapter - Graduating from UIC
item.description: On May 6, 2023, I graduated from UIC with a degree in Computer Science and a minor in Art. It was a day full of smiles, memories, and a reminder of just how much growth can happen in four years.
